config-rpm.script:
file='/etc/deploy/deploy.conf'
# create the base file if needed if ! [ -f $file ]; then mkdir -p $(dirname $file) echo "<deploy> </deploy>" > $file fi
# add elements as needed lib="<lib-path>%{git-workspace}/%{tag}</lib-path>" share="<share-path>%{git-workspace}/%{tag}/share/deploy</share-path>" tmpl="<templates-path>%{git-workspace}/%{tag}/share/deploy/templates</templates-path>"
for elem in $lib $share $tmpl; do if ! grep -q $elem $file; then sed -i '/<\/deploy>/d' $file echo $elem >> $file echo "</deploy>" >> $file fi done
# create symlink to binary ln -sf %{git-workspace}/%{tag}/bin/deploy /usr/bin/deploy
# create symlink to python libraries rm -f %{python-site-packages-path}/deploy ln -s %{git-workspace}/%{tag}/deploy %{python-site-packages-path}/deploy

# clone deploy repository if [ ! -e %{git-workspace} ]; then /bin/mkdir %{git-workspace}; fi
if [[ ! %{tag} = deploy ]]; then args="-r %{tag}" fi
if [ ! -d %{git-workspace}/%{tag} ]; then cd %{git-workspace} git clone https://www.deployproject.org/git/public/deploy $args cd - fi
